10Gbps DDOS Protection
All of our vps servers come with 10Gbps, 10Mpps ddos protection and are located in Dallas, TX.

Order them from https://www.servercheap.com/vps/

We have been offering hosting since 2012 and know the industry well. We own, manage, control and maintain our hardware.

The below VPS come with a 7 day money back guarantee. Since we own all of our hardware, we are not under pressure to overload any of our server nodes. We keep node loads low and keep adding nodes as needed.

The VPS are NOT OVERSOLD. 3Ghz or higher clock rate.

We also own our AS Number AS62633 which will be set up shortly https://whois.arin.net/rest/asn/AS62633.html

CHOOSE FROM THE SOLUSVM TEMPLATE OR INSTALL ANY OS VIA ISO. If an ISO is not already in our system and you want to use your own, we will attach any ISO.

No illegal activities, mining, bulk mailing without permission, open proxies, open relays, TOR, excessive overloading, vulnerability testing, etc are some of our prohibited activities.

SolusVM panel comes with the VPS
